page.title: 02Local Festivals.
page.content: In Fishlake there are four local festivals.Fishlake Show is held for livestock and horsejumping competitions.The show is combined with amusements and arts for young and old. Every year a garden party is held in the vicarage.The main attraction is the traditional maypole dancing. Village children dress up in laced clothes.At Jubilee a float travels round the village.Children dress up in red white and blue uniforms.The float is driven by a tractor.On the back of the float is a band which plays a selection of melodies.A wheelbarrow race is also held every summer for blind,deaf and dumb charities. Prizes are awarded to the fastest and the best decorated wheelbarrow.
